channel.title: Matthew Threlfall Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Matthew Threlfall Portfolio

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World! I’m Matthew Threlfall a Software Engineer with interests surrounding cyber security, machine learning and game development. For work I work in a variety of languages including but not limited to Python 2⁄3, Golang, C# and many more. In my spare time I work on games with my friends and I am a third owner of Ametentia, a game development studio where I mostly partake in designing and developing games.
